thread.section_title: :) phoneinc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of :) phoneinc | phoneinc.com.au
thread.title: Mackie Armitage

author: Mackie Armitage
title: Mackie Armitage
text: Ordered this phone,arrived in record time. first time novice user of mobile phone and needed lots of instruction and assistance to help me navigate my way into this new device.Most impressed with the quality and affordability and features of this phone but unfortunately reluctantly had to return it due to no service problems in my area.This company was very easy to negotiate with and provided me with a full refund. Highly recommended.
